item.title: Comment on Be in to win! by Kerin Paterson
item.dc:creator: Kerin Paterson
item.description: Toby loves going to HeadsnTails and cryis at the window of the car to go play. He comes home tired and happy after playing all day and sleeps until we wake him for bed. Very impressed with the care and attention given to our fur baby. Thank you Lorraine.
item.content:encoded: Toby loves going to HeadsnTails and cryis at the window of the car to go play. He comes home tired and happy after playing all day and sleeps until we wake him for bed. Very impressed with the care and attention given to our fur baby. Thank you Lorraine.
